name: track-slide
description: Constructor to slide multiple objects on a track rather than individually.

scripts.standalone: browserify -t [exposify --expose [ --jquery jQuery --c2-event-handler eventHandler --jquery-dragger Dragger ] ] track-slide.js --outfile standalone/track-slide.js --standalone TrackSlide
scripts.build: npm run bundle-test && npm run standalone && npm run dist

author: The C2 Group
